hints.content:
![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/8d66723ef0eeb3622d88c062d3ef0493.png)

$\qquad \begin{align}&\green8 \text{ Ed's goals}\\
+&  \underline{\blue5 \text{ Javi's goals }}\\
=&\pink{13} \text{ total goals}\end{align}$

question.content:
Ed scored $8$ goals for his soccer team this season. Javi scored $5$ goals. 



**Write a number sentence to show how many goals Ed and Javi scored for their team this season. **

$8$ $ + $ [[☃ input-number 3]] $ = $ [[☃ input-number 4]]
